main event: Observers watched a light in the sky for about 15 minutes at Manassa, Virginia, on May 12, 1954. The light appeared brilliant, then dimmed and disappeared.
interesting points: The light was described as a strange thing in the sky., The sighting lasted for 15 minutes., The object displayed erratic behavior in its course., Witnesses reported a change in brightness and flickering of the object., The observation was deemed a reliable account of an unidentified aerial phenomenon.
sighted object: a strange bright light in the sky
witness description: Observers noted the light's characteristics but no specific witness details provided.
